topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Chat :: Internet Relay Chat

name: SuperVixen
short_description: SuperVixen is an IRC bouncer written in C, and uses pthreads to manage connections (from clients and to IRC server). It's pretty basic and allowes you to have several clients connected to the bouncer at the same time.
